name: Archers Need Arrows
description:
Game for Ludum Dare 45.

You are a archer but not have a bow and arrows .

Tutorial:
Press [W] [A] [S] [D] to move
Press  [SPACE BAR] to cut the trees
The trees drop woodlogs
Use craft table to craft arrows and bow
1 wood log = 1 arrow
10 arrows = 1 bow / Press [MOUSE LEFT] to shoot arrows

Develop in Unity 2019.2
Art by me [I try]
HUD Fonts by Textcraft and Kenney
